title: Number of pet birds in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of birds in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of birds in millions is roughly constant from 2000 to 2006, and lastly slightly increasing from 2006 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2014.
The highest Number of birds in millions, of value 20.6 was reached at Year 2014
Minimum Number of birds in millions about 15.0 was reached at Year 2008
min_summary: In general Number of birds in millions has rose over the Year.
